description: Mentioned only in passing by Audsley, who says: [Clarin] is labeled in Spanish organs with several qualifications as follows: Clarin Real, Clarin de Batalla, Clarin Claro, Clarin Sordino, Clarin Pardo, Clarin de Bajos, and Clarin de Ecos.
